name: Cortana
description: Cortana is a native digital asset built on the Cardano blockchain, designed for use within decentralized applications (dApps) and Cardano-based ecosystems. It aims to enhance utility in decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols and facilitate user engagement across various Cardano-powered platforms.
